Key Match Events: Benches-clearing incident after Nick Castellanos was plunked by Edwin Uceta
Trea Turner hit a two-run homer
Bryce Harper hit a double after Turner's homer
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos had harsh words about the incident, calling out Uceta for intentionally throwing at him
Castellanos' plunking created even more emotion due to the Phillies' current injuries
Miscellaneous Highlights: Edwin Uceta was suspended for three games, and manager Kevin Cash for one
The Phillies took over the best record in baseball after the win
Others: The incident led to the benches clearing, and the Phillies are hoping to dominate the finale on Wednesday
